definition.en: 'Rain' (when occurring with nig₂-mul(-an); Sallaberger, 'Nachrichten' (2003), 620 and n19, suggests reports of rainfall in neighboring territories were brought to the Palace.

example.en: 2 ib₂-IIItug₂ gun₃ / maškim / ik-na-da-ar / maškim / iš₁₁-ru-ut / nig₂-mul / A / in / a-ḫa-za-luki / šu-ba₄-ti, 2 embroidered waistbands, Igna-dar's appointee (and) Išrut's appointee, (for bringing back) the news of the rainfall in Aḫazalu have received (ARET XX 8 = TM.75.G.2512, obv.VI:3-12).
